column1: #These are automatically triggered as soon as MonikAI starts up. Only one of them is triggered however.
column3: you can use {name} and {date} as placeholders for obvious things

column5: What are you up to today?
column7: Care to join me for some tea?

column5: I'm doing fine, now that you are here~

column7: Remember, I'm always here for you~

column3: Just in time for some tea!
Did you know I love you?
column7: By the way, I love you!

column3: I'm having a lot of fun here~
column5: It's fun to see what you get up to.
